title: How To Manage 45 Billion Client Records With Aerospike
author: Joab Jackson
description: At Aerospike's Real Time Data Summit last week, Adjust's Bubunyo Nyavo, explained how the company used Aerospike to help clients track the return-on-investment of their marketing channels.
cntitle: 如何使用 Aerospike 管理 450 亿条客户记录
cndescription: 上周在 Aerospike 的实时数据峰会上，Adjust 的 Bubunyo Nyavo 解释了该公司如何使用 Aerospike 来帮助客户跟踪其营销渠道的投资回报率。
